title: Exemption and Accommodation Frameworks
prompt: A weathered kitchen table in a small rural home during early morning light, scattered with maps, handwritten notes, and administrative documents, hands of two people (one pointing to a location on a map, the other taking notes) visible from above, window behind showing an expansive but distant landscape obscured by fog or distance, muted gray-green and warm cream tones, documentary photography style capturing the quiet complexity of planning work far from institutional settings.
